title: Himi 120
lyrics:
M.NG.
1.
Ha’u ‘akimoutolu, ‘oku
Tui kia Sīsū;
Ke tau fakaongo atu,
‘Ene angalelei.
2.
Ko hotau Fakamo’ui.
‘A ‘ene ‘Afio;
Ke tau hiva fiefia,
‘I he’ene ‘ofa.
3.
‘Oku kei tatali ia,
Pea Tukituki;
Ki he loto kotoa pē,
‘O e angakovi.
4.
‘Oua na’a teke’i ia,
‘E he angakovi;
Kae tō ‘a e matapā
Ki he ‘Eiki lelei.
5.
’Oku mau fiefia fai,
Pea ‘amanaki;
Te ke hū ki loto, ‘Eiki,
Ke mau mo’ui ai.
6.
Ko e ‘Eiki mei langi,
‘A e ‘Afiona;
Ke ke hā’ele vave mai,
Ke tau nonofo ma’u.
7.
Pea ke tau ‘ohomohe,
‘E ‘Eiki, mo koe,
‘I he katoanga, ko e
‘Ofa ta’engata. *
